AI工具有助于跟踪多发性硬化症患者的治疗进展UCL研究人员已经开发了一种新的人工智能（AI）工具，可以帮助解释和评估多发性硬化症患者（MS）的治疗良好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/ai-tool-helps-track-track-wareatment-progress-in-multiple-sclerosis-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/ai-tool-helps-track-track-treatment-progress-in-multiple-sclerosis-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1E62140-303D-4C05-9E9C-72D4EF26B72D Mon, 07 Apr 2025 09:48:37 -0400 AI tool helps track treatment progress in multiple sclerosis patients
研究发现Sjögren综合征腺体损伤的根本原因Sjögren's综合征是一种慢性自身免疫性疾病，在全球范围内影响数百万，尤其是女性，导致口腔和眼睛的干燥不舒服。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/research-uncovers-root-cause-cause-of-gland-gland-damage-in-sjogrens-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/research-uncovers-root-cause-cause-of-gland-gland-damage-in-sjogrens-sjogrens-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd2222af-2b17-4ba9-bafe-a3A8CBDD3794 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:33:44 -0400 Research uncovers root cause of gland damage in Sjögren's syndrome
长期空气污染威胁的老年人的大脑健康长期暴露于高水平的空气污染可能会损害英格兰老年人的大脑健康，这是UCL研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/brain-health-inger-inger------------------------ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/brain-health-inder--in--in--in--in----------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96EE280C-5CCE-4EEE-8803-40BFA4C6F7C5 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:26:36 -0400 Brain health in older adults threatened by prolonged air pollution
在大型研究中，多动症药物对心脏健康的影响很小由南安普敦大学（University of Southampton）领导的一项新研究发现，多动症的药物在数周或几个月后对血压和心率的总体影响总体上很小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/adhd-medications-show-minimal-iminimal-impact-on-hearthealth-health-health-narde in-large-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/adhd-medications-show-minimal-inimal-impact-on-heart-health-health-health-health-narge-pudy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc65fb25-17e1-4A39-9715-7318090A2A28 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 08:08:31 -0400 ADHD medications show minimal impact on heart health in large study
新的抗体研究激发了人们对更好百日咳疫苗的希望百日咳或百日咳，曾经是美国儿童的主要死亡原因，在1940年代引入疫苗之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-antibody-research-sparks-hope-for-better-better-whooping-whooping-cough-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-antibody-research-sparks-sparks-hope-for-better-better-whooping-cough-cough-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d9b6f0e-b242-49dc-8266-CF6B3917BB23 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 07:56:07 -0400 New antibody research sparks hope for better whooping cough vaccines

科学家工程师有望实现莱姆病的疫苗目标满足对疫苗的未满足需求是研究莱姆病的研究人员的重中之重，研究人员每年在美国感染约476,000人，并且可能会带来严重的并发症，例如持续的疲劳和关节问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/scientists-engineer-promising-vaccine-vaccine-target-for-lyme-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/scientists-engineer-promising-vaccine-vaccine-target-for-lyme-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1219b514-321a-4b20-9cda-956015db85cc Mon, 07 Apr 2025 07:43:12 -0400 Scientists engineer promising vaccine target for Lyme disease
